titles: A memorial of all the English monarchs being in number 151, from Brute to King Charles. In heroicall verse by Io. Taylor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Beale, for Iames Bowler,
notes: The first leaf and the last two leaves are blank.
Running title reads: A memoriall of monarchs from Brute to King Charles.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
With added frontispiece portrait of King Charles. Some print faded and show-through; some pages creased, torn, and tightly bound.
keywords: Great Britain --  Kings and rulers --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
